title: $2T U.S. Government Stimulus Package, Surge in Telemedicine
itunes:title: $2T U.S. Government Stimulus Package, Surge in Telemedicine
description:
We get the Businessweek Agenda with Bloomberg News International Economics & Policy Michael McKee and Bloomberg Stocks Editor Dave Wilson. Bloomberg News Congressional Tax Reporter Laura Davison discusses a record $2 trillion U.S. government stimulus package. Dr. Ian Lustbader, Clinical Professor of Medicine at NYU, provides an update on the coronavirus and telemedicine surging. Bloomberg Businessweek Editor Joel Weber and Bryan Gruley, P&I Reporter for Bloomberg News, share their insight on how 3M is working to double the production of N95 masks. Boris Jordan, Executive Chairman at Curaleaf, talks about how the medical cannabis company is dealing with the coronavirus. And we Drive to the Close with John Lovito, Co-CIO of Global Fixed Income.

Hosts: Carol Massar and Jason Kelly. Producer: Doni Holloway.


See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
